title: cryptoaddictchie
author: cryptoaddictchie
content: Archway a new project on cosmos blockchain have annoucned their giving off airdrop tokens to some of the communities. Here is their teaser tweet for that.https://twitter.com/archwayHQ/status/1665386030319509508?t=ZDVbzFutLPMaehPe3HuRjg&s=19Three communities are eligible to receive their free tokens.1. Atom stakers2. Axelar Bridge users3. Terra Money contract deployers.If you did any or three of them congrats more tokens on your part. I see their having the token sale at coinlist on 15th but the instruction on how to claim the airdrop isnt announced yet.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Hello everyon Archway airdrop tokens details are announced already. For atom stakers that have 25 to 2000 on validators except some indicated on the docs congrats youll earned 207 arch tokens. For axelar bridges ans terra deployer will get 400 arch tokens. Here is the link of the details. https://docs.archway.io/community/airdrop-snapshotsCongrats to all who are qualified.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: israt1@ on June 14, 2023, 11:26:57 PMAirdrops are mostly promoted as fake. Here is a chart showing how many people will win this airdrop and how much money they will get.Its not fake Im following the official site and you could see some posted their eligibility for archway. What you mean chart? Are you saying they wont distribute the tokens? I doubt that since the project is legit and got presale on coinlist. Regarding the price value, they would do 0.20$ each on their sale if you compute that on possible reward 207 x 0.2 its $41 but if its the same as on their sale of course it will go up thats how tou could earn more.

comments.author: MainIbem
comments.body: Quote from: israt1@ on June 14, 2023, 11:26:57 PMAirdrops are mostly promoted as fake. Here is a chart showing how many people will win this airdrop and how much money they will get.You can call it a fake if you are not qualify to receive the airdrop token, I could remembered those days back then when Uniswap were doing their airdrop, it was like a joke but people received some thousand dollars through their airdrop. I have seen a friend whom I know too well received about 400 Uniswap token at then it was around $2 to 4$ per token and he sold out make some pretty cool amount.So don't see some of these airdrop as fake or do you think this user who posted would come to post shit airdrop or promote fake airdrop?From my little research @cryptoaddictchie is not someone who would come to promote a shitcoin or fake airdrop in that such manner.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: israt1@ on June 14, 2023, 11:26:57 PMAirdrops are mostly promoted as fake. Here is a chart showing how many people will win this airdrop and how much money they will get.There may be many fake airdrops online these days from some of the newly launched projects but i want to ascertain two facts to you here, first of all always considers the person promoting such airdrops and check their reputation because I've learnt that most of the promoters are people we aren't familiar with or their project they promote, @cryptoaddictchie is well recognized on the forum and has a good reputation which i know he wouldn't want to partake in anything that may tanish his image, he must also have trusted them before bringing them up to the forum, am not saying this to side him but to let you know that despite there's a lot going out there turning scam, we can still have the few to be trusted.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Quote from: Doan9269 on June 15, 2023, 04:08:16 PMQuote from: israt1@ on June 14, 2023, 11:26:57 PMAirdrops are mostly promoted as fake. Here is a chart showing how many people will win this airdrop and how much money they will get.There may be many fake airdrops online these days from some of the newly launched projects but i want to ascertain two facts to you here, first of all always considers the person promoting such airdrops and check their reputation because I've learnt that most of the promoters are people we aren't familiar with or their project they promote, @cryptoaddictchie is well recognized on the forum and has a good reputation which i know he wouldn't want to partake in anything that may tanish his image, he must also have trusted them before bringing them up to the forum, am not saying this to side him but to let you know that despite there's a lot going out there turning scam, we can still have the few to be trusted. Most of the airdrop being promoted by @cryptoadditchie requires a participation on the blockchain of that specific project therefore there’s a work done here to receive an airdrop. Legit airdrop usually requires participation on blockchain ecosystem to rewards those early users and have a marketing at the same time on these communities.Most of the fake airdrop usually doesn't require you anything rather than filling a form or sending some tokens on a specific smart contract address. The OP doesn't give financial advice here so don't look on his reputation when participating on these airdrops. DYOR always since no one will be liable when you accidentally loss money by participating on this airdrop since he just share. The only thing you can guarantee here is most of these airdrop has a high success rate.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: MainIbem on June 15, 2023, 12:21:45 PMFrom my little research @cryptoaddictchie is not someone who would come to promote a shitcoin or fake airdrop in that such manner.Thanks but I actually sharing this since I staked atom. So might wanna help those who are also stakers that are unaware of this potential drop.Quote from: Doan9269 on June 15, 2023, 04:08:16 PM@cryptoaddictchie is well recognized on the forum and has a good reputation which i know he wouldn't want to partake in anything that may tanish his image, he must also have trusted them before bringing them up to the forumI didnt know I was a recognize that well here but thanks. Its not that Ive trusted them I just found out this drop few days ago since they announced it. Im not promoting this for disclaimer, I just actually informing a news to anyone who might be eligible for this.Quote from: Beparanf on June 15, 2023, 04:16:33 PMMost of the airdrop being promoted by @cryptoadditchie requires a participation on the blockchain of that specific project therefore there’s a work done here to receive an airdrop. Yeah mostly retroactive drops cause since then nothing gets from actual free airdrop and if they did most likely its a scam compared to retroactive ones. But this one though, involved staking, using bridge, or deploying a contract. Only got the staking alone.Oh and btw here is the summarize from the team.https://blog.archway.io/the-tl-dr-behind-archways-genesis-archdrop-d4a2904336fe

comments.author: MainIbem
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoaddictchie on June 16, 2023, 06:38:42 AMQuote from: MainIbem on June 15, 2023, 12:21:45 PMFrom my little research @cryptoaddictchie is not someone who would come to promote a shitcoin or fake airdrop in that such manner.Thanks but I actually sharing this since I staked atom. So might wanna help those who are also stakers that are unaware of this potential drop.Yes I understand, though I was actually referring to israt1@ on the post above.You did well to had share over here, I do not own any of this token so I have missed this chance maybe next I would try to hold some variety of tokens to enable me qualify in most of the airdrops. Just that for some while now I have not been active anticipating on altcoin due to their uncontrollable price drop and failures.

comments.author: zonefloor
comments.body: In other words, such airdrops have increased greatly in many periods. Especially testnet networks started to airdrop a lot. Oh, that doesn't mean that every airdrop will be fake. In general, it is useful to follow such airdrops because they can make good profits. Here's a post on twitter about who will get how much. I don't think this airdrop could be fake because of a legendary member sharing it.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: MainIbem on June 17, 2023, 08:38:02 PMYou did well to had share over here, I do not own any of this token so I have missed this chance maybe next I would try to hold some variety of tokens to enable me qualify in most of the airdrops. Thanks. Well in this situation where those tokens are down. Its really great opportunity to get some. Though its not a financial advise, since its quite risky. Those airdrops arent sure to come at your way. But just expect the unexpected like this one.Quote from: zonefloor on June 17, 2023, 10:41:24 PMI don't think this airdrop could be fake because of a legendary member sharing it.Its not and a lot of confirmation from the project itself. But its not a free one like you fill up form. There are considerable task attached with it. Also dont get wrong about rank, reputation since some high rank could use their account to fool other of a potential airdrop hence benefited their hidden agenda. Its always good to verify yourself if you encounter an airdrop.

comments.author: MainIbem
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoaddictchie on June 18, 2023, 01:49:10 AMQuote from: MainIbem on June 17, 2023, 08:38:02 PMYou did well to had share over here, I do not own any of this token so I have missed this chance maybe next I would try to hold some variety of tokens to enable me qualify in most of the airdrops. Thanks. Well in this situation where those tokens are down. Its really great opportunity to get some. Though its not a financial advise, since its quite risky. Those airdrops arent sure to come at your way. But just expect the unexpected like this one.By now I should get used to the cryptocurrency market and how it operates knowing that anyone doing investment is on their own risk and should do due diligence on the respective token and coin I wants to venture into. Generally as said, the entire cryptocurrency market is unpredictable so anyone making a decision should understand what it takes first before working on the action to buy those tokens. Quote from: cryptoaddictchie on June 18, 2023, 01:49:10 AMQuote from: zonefloor on June 17, 2023, 10:41:24 PMI don't think this airdrop could be fake because of a legendary member sharing it.Its not and a lot of confirmation from the project itself. But its not a free one like you fill up form. There are considerable task attached with it. Also dont get wrong about rank, reputation since some high rank could use their account to fool other of a potential airdrop hence benefited their hidden agenda. Its always good to verify yourself if you encounter an airdrop. This is absolutely correct because most of them are too mischievous.. Though I know some few user who would post airdrop that will attract my attention and entire users here. Airdrops that results filling of form are often turn out to be scam and shit airdrop, some of which are likely to be used to boost and increased their social media profiles etc.
